title: Step 3 - Generate Synthetic Health Data
summary: Apply approved synthesis techniques to generate synthetic data while maintaining data utility and privacy. Document processes for transparency.
checklist: Select synthesis method appropriate to data type and intended use.
Validate algorithms for statistical fidelity and privacy protection.
Record synthesis parameters and version of generator used.
Conduct internal testing for quality, representativeness and bias.
Store synthesis scripts securely and maintain provenance logs.

decisions.question: Does the synthetic dataset achieve adequate utility?
Has privacy risk increased due to overfitting?

governance_intent: Balance data utility with privacy during generation.
